targets.queryText: SELECT attr_1m_total_return_dollars AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT symbol, contribution_dollars, contribution_pct, income_pct, price_pct FROM daily_return_attribution WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_return_attribution) AND window = '1m' AND contributor_type = 'top' ORDER BY contribution_dollars DESC LIMIT 5;
